pages.text: Platysomus is a disc shaped palaeoniscid fish which has been found worldwide. It was pretty small, about 18 cm long and had a flattened body and elongated dorsal and anal fins. It is thought to have fed on plankton.
$(l)Eats:$() Fish Food$(br)$(l)Breeds with:$() Fish Food$(br)$(l)Egg Type:$() Drops Egg$(br)$(l)Method of Obtaining:$() Bucket
